description:
NEW! NEW! NEW!

Course Objective: Learn essential aspects of using The Genesis Framework to build responsive websites.

This course was developed to teach interested ones how to use The Genesis Theme Framework to create professional responsive websites.

  • No Coding
  • Prior WordPress Experience Required

*** ALL LECTURES ARE IN HIGH DEFINITION (HD) ***

In my more than 35 years of formal teaching experience, I have found that the best approach to teaching was for the teacher to place himself at the desk of and in the role of the student. And, to teach in a manner imaging that he himself is the student.

Some instructors teach over the head of the student. Not all students are the same. Yet, it is the responsibility of the teacher to find a way to reach students who "just don't get it." Indeed, the teacher should sweat over finding a solution to reach that student. If necessary, lose sleep over it. Then when the light bulb in that students head "turns on" then there is the reward!

In this course, I will teach with the Look-Over-My-Shoulder lecture method and DEMONSTRATE to you using essential aspects of the most wonderful Genesis Framework.

Here Is a List of Some the Things You Will Learn

  • Understanding the Genesis Parent/Child Theme Relationship
  • What Files You Can Modify Within The Genesis Framework
  • How To Use Genesis Loops
  • How To Use Genesis Action Hooks
  • How To Use Genesis Filters
  • How To Use Genesis Functions
  • How To Edit Genesis Child Themes
  • How To Modify The Style.css

Let Me Help You

So if you have a strong desire or compelling need to learn The Genesis Framework for personal or business use, then this course is for you.

I would like to remind you that my course comes with a 30 days « no questions asked » money back guarantee. You have a full month to give it a spin, and try it out and if, for whatever reasons, you are unsatisfied, just ask for your refund. You take absolutely no risk!

After taking my course, any mystique you may have had about The Genesis Framework will be removed. You will feel confident in your ability to make The Genesis Framework do what you want it to do.

Click the "Take This Course" button now.

Kind regards,

R. Jerome Harris
title: Genesis Framework Essentials 2015
